title: Not receiving chests in the new season?
body: I got an S and S- with shyv in the new season and didn't get a chest, same with several other champs.  For some reason I am not earning the chest anytime I get an S, or when a teammate gets an S. help?

replies.body: just got s- on nautilus didnt get chest on that one either
i just played a game got s on varus didnt get a chest

It is a new season so mastery chests have reset.  I wasn't able to locate an S on shyvana or a premade while playing her, though.  I do see that Shyvana was unlocked very recently, so keep in mind that you do have to own a champion to receive a mastery chest per the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  Good luck!
